title: An overview of pQTLdata
text: showcase EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75 Bioconductor. Table 4.1: Annotation BRCA1 TP53 org.Hs.eg.db focused genes.
code: ensembldb::metadata(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75) #>                  name                               value #> 1             Db type                               EnsDb #> 2     Type of Gene ID                     Ensembl Gene ID #> 3  Supporting package                           ensembldb #> 4       Db created by ensembldb package from Bioconductor #> 5      script_version                               0.3.0 #> 6       Creation time            Thu May 18 09:15:45 2017 #> 7     ensembl_version                                  75 #> 8        ensembl_host                           localhost #> 9            Organism                        homo_sapiens #> 10        taxonomy_id                                9606 #> 11       genome_build                              GRCh37 #> 12    DBSCHEMAVERSION                                 2.0 ensembldb::keytypes(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75) #>  [1] "ENTREZID"            "EXONID"              "GENEBIOTYPE"         #>  [4] "GENEID"              "GENENAME"            "PROTDOMID"           #>  [7] "PROTEINDOMAINID"     "PROTEINDOMAINSOURCE" "PROTEINID"           #> [10] "SEQNAME"             "SEQSTRAND"           "SYMBOL"              #> [13] "TXBIOTYPE"           "TXID"                "TXNAME"              #> [16] "UNIPROTID" exon_info <- ensembldb::exons(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75) gene_info <- ensembldb::genes(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75) transcript_info <- ensembldb::transcripts(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75) colnames(S4Vectors::mcols(gene_info)) #> [1] "gene_id"          "gene_name"        "gene_biotype"     "seq_coord_system" #> [5] "symbol"           "entrezid" colnames(S4Vectors::mcols(transcript_info)) #> [1] "tx_id"            "tx_biotype"       "tx_cds_seq_start" "tx_cds_seq_end"   #> [5] "gene_id"          "tx_name" overlaps <- IRanges::findOverlaps(transcript_info, gene_info) overlapping_transcripts <- transcript_info[queryHits(overlaps)] overlapping_genes <- gene_info[subjectHits(overlaps)] overlap_data <- data.frame(   transcript_id = mcols(overlapping_transcripts)$tx_id,   gene_id = S4Vectors::mcols(overlapping_genes)$gene_id,   gene_name = S4Vectors::mcols(overlapping_genes)$gene_name,   start = pmax(start(overlapping_transcripts), start(overlapping_genes)),   end = pmin(end(overlapping_transcripts), end(overlapping_genes)) ) gene_symbols <- c("BRCA1", "TP53") gene_data <- subset(overlap_data,gene_name%in%gene_symbols,select=-c(gene_id,gene_name)) cols <- c("UNIPROTID","PROTEINID","GENEID","GENENAME","SEQNAME","TXID") info <- ensembldb::select(EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75, keys = gene_symbols,                            columns = cols, keytype = "SYMBOL") |>         dplyr::left_join(head(gene_data,15),by=c('TXID'='transcript_id')) |>         subset(!is.na(UNIPROTID)&!is.na(start)&!is.na(end)) knitr::kable(head(info,15),caption="Annotation for BRCA1 and TP53") keytypes(org.Hs.eg.db) #>  [1] "ACCNUM"       "ALIAS"        "ENSEMBL"      "ENSEMBLPROT"  "ENSEMBLTRANS" #>  [6] "ENTREZID"     "ENZYME"       "EVIDENCE"     "EVIDENCEALL"  "GENENAME"     #> [11] "GENETYPE"     "GO"           "GOALL"        "IPI"          "MAP"          #> [16] "OMIM"         "ONTOLOGY"     "ONTOLOGYALL"  "PATH"         "PFAM"         #> [21] "PMID"         "PROSITE"      "REFSEQ"       "SYMBOL"       "UCSCKG"       #> [26] "UNIPROT" uniprot_ids <- ensembldb::select(org.Hs.eg.db, keys = gene_symbols, columns = "UNIPROT", keytype = "SYMBOL") #> 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns options(sys_options)

code: @Manual{,   title = {pQTLdata: A Collection of Proteome Panels and Metadata},   author = {Jing Hua Zhao},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.6, https://github.com/jinghuazhao/pQTLdata},   url = {https://jinghuazhao.github.io/pQTLdata/}, }

what: A Collection of Proteome Panels and Metadata
title: Protein Quantitative Trait Locus meta-data
text: aggregates protein panel data metadata protein quantitative trait locus (pQTL) analysis using ‘pQTLtools’ (https://jinghuazhao.github.io/pQTLtools/). package includes data affinity-based panels ‘Olink’ (https://olink.com/) ‘SomaScan’ (https://somalogic.com/), well mass spectrometry-based panels ‘CellCarta’ (https://cellcarta.com/), ‘Seer’ (https://seer.bio/) ‘SWATH-MS’ (doi:10.15252/msb.20178126). metadata encompasses updated annotations publication details.

title: Protein Quantitative Trait Locus meta-data
code: # CRAN install.packages("pQTLdata")  # GitHub if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("jinghuazhao/pQTLdata")

title: Protein Quantitative Trait Locus meta-data
code: git clone https://github.com/jinghuazhao/pQTLdata R CMD INSTALL pQTLdata

title: A summary of datasets — pQTLdata
text: aggregates protein panel data metadata protein quantitative trait locus (pQTL) analysis using 'pQTLtools' (https://jinghuazhao.github.io/pQTLtools/). package includes data affinity-based panels 'Olink' (https://olink.com/) 'SomaScan' (https://somalogic.com/), well mass spectrometry-based panels 'CellCarta' (https://cellcarta.com/), 'Seer' (https://seer.bio/) 'SWATH-MS' (doi:10.15252/msb.20178126 ). metadata encompasses updated annotations publication details.

title: A summary of datasets — pQTLdata
text: Available data listed following table. generic description datasets follows. chr Chromosome. start Start position. end End position. gene Gene name. UniProt UniProt ID.

text: Vignettes package usage: Overview pQTLdata. vignette("pQTLdata").

Suhre K, Chen Q, Halama , Mendez K, Dahlin , Stephan N, Thareja G, Sarwath H, Guturu H, Dwaraka VB, Batzoglou S, Schmidt F, Lasky-Su JA (2024). “genome-wide association study mass spectrometry proteomics using Seer Proteograph platform.” BioRxiv. doi:10.1101/2024.05.27.596028 .

code: # \donttest{ # Olink-SomaScan panel overlap p <- list(setdiff(inf1$uniprot,"P23560"),           setdiff(SomaScan160410$UniProt[!is.na(SomaScan160410$UniProt)],"P23560")) cnames <- c("INF1","SomaScan") os <- VennDiagram::venn.diagram(x = p, category.names=cnames, filename=NULL,                                 disable.logging = TRUE,height=8,width=8,units="in") #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40] $x #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40] p #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40]  #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40] $category.names #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40] cnames #> INFO [2025-03-26 14:32:40] title: Supplementary table 3 — scallop_inf1
text: Zhao JH, Stacey D, Eriksson N, Macdonald-Dunlop E, Hedman ÅK, Kalnapenkis , Enroth S, Cozzetto D, Digby-Bell J, Marten J, Folkersen L, Herder C, Jonsson L, Bergen SE, Gieger C, Needham EJ, Surendran P, Team EBR, Paul DS, Polasek O, Thorand B, Grallert H, Roden M, Võsa U, Esko T, Hayward C, Johansson Å, Gyllensten U, Powell N, Hansson O, Mattsson-Carlgren N, Joshi PK, Danesh J, Padyukov L, Klareskog L, Landén M, Wilson JF, Siegbahn , Wallentin L, Mälarstig , Butterworth , Peters JE (2023). “Genetics circulating inflammatory proteins identifies drivers immune-mediated disease risk therapeutic targets.” Nature Immunology, 24(9), 1540-1551. doi:10.1038/s41590-023-01588-w .

title: pQTLdata 0.6
text: (2025/3/26) Add logo/favicons Grok-3, huggingface.co/spaces/-lain/background-removal, usethis::use_logo() (jpg), DjVuLibre/3.5.28, ImageMagick/7.1.1-31 (png), pkgdown::build_favicons(). Add reference swath_ms. Drop GitHub _pkgdown.yml. Revise pQTLdata.Rmd using ‘CairoPNG’ options(). Revise DESCRIPTION/(Title, URL), README.Rmd CRAN publication.

title: pQTLdata 0.5
text: CRAN release: 2025-03-07 (2025/3/5) Add README.Rmd extract DESCRIPTION/Description README.md. Automate knitr::knit(“README.Rmd”);devtools::document() pkgdown::build_site(). Revise DESCRIPTION/pQTLdata.R(md)/inst/scripts (suggested Beni Altmann). Revise _pkgdown.yml.

title: pQTLdata 0.4
text: (2025/3/2) CRAN submission Extend Description add seer1980 data/datalist.

title: pQTLdata 0.3
text: (2025/2/20) Add Olink-Target-96-Assay-List.xlsx (15 panels). Drop olink-explore-ht-assay-list-2023-07-12.xlsx (5,343) olink-explore-ht-assay-list.xlsx (5,416=5,400+). Add single quotes software names Title/Description inside DESCRIPTION (suggested Uwe Ligges). Minor changes including splitting utils.R vignette.

title: pQTLdata 0.2
text: (2025/2/19) Remove biomaRt, hg19, hg19Tables, st[4|6|18] except R scripts revise vignette. Add Ensembl gene ID caprion & URL DESCRIPTION simplify inst/scripts/docs.sh. Add Information Thermo Fisher Scientific - LSMS / NCI Proteomic Data Commons. Add/remove information Olink® Target 96 Inflammation Panels. Add inst/README.md, SomaLogic/ given SomaScan.db developed.

title: pQTLdata 0.1
text: (2024/06/10) Olink/, EndNote/, scripts/ inst/. caprion.rda caprion.R. seer1980.rda seer1980.R. biomaRt.rda, hg19.rda, hg19Tables.rda, inf1.rda, scallop_inf1, st4.rda, st6.rda, st18.rda, drop hgTables. Q8NF90 Q8WWJ7 inf1.rda listed UCSC, replaced P12034 P30203 UniProt. SomaScan lookup (panels, box, ST4, ST6). Remove characters iconv. Adopt pkgdown, bookdown-driven vignette, 1/10 version increment algorithm. Imports knitr, Rdpack. Suggests dplyr, grid, VennDiagram. First release.
